title: Computer Sys Security
description: Trusted computing base, hardware support for protection and virtualization, authentication, access control and authorization, discretionary and mandatory security policies, secure kernel design, and secure databases. Students cannot receive credit for CS 4238 and CS 6238.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 3210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
